author: Philiana Ng
title: Andrew Garfield Cozies Up to Dev Patel After Looking for Someone to Kiss at the Oscars
text:
Andrew Garfield Cozies Up to Dev Patel After Looking for Someone to Kiss at the Oscars by Philiana Ng 8:38   Photo: ABC Sorry, Ryan Reynolds , looks like Andrew Garfield has moved on! Weeks after Garfield and Reynolds made out at the Golden Globe Awards in January, shocking everyone (including Garfield‚Äôs ex, Emma Stone !), the Hacksaw Ridge star struck up a new bromance at the 89th Annual Academy Awards. 
During a break in the action on Sunday, Garfield was seen in an intimate embrace and enjoying a deep conversation with Lion star and fellow Oscar nominee, Dev Patel, prompting many to take to Twitter to request that they kiss. ‚Äî Denise Warner (@DeniseMarie13) February 27, 2017 The internet wants what the internet wants! DEV PATEL AND ANDREW GARFIELD @anyasdimitris pic.twitter.com/e1Mjb4x6dL ‚Äî wes gibbins üêß (@jamesypotters) February 27, 2017 Dev Patel and Andrew Garfield embracing eachother i'm dead pic.twitter.com/22utIZqYv6 Dev Patel longingly looking into Andrew Garfield's eyes. I've had this dream before #Oscars pic.twitter.com/FFQLMGETKY ‚Äî Katie Ferguson (@KatieRoseFerg) February 27, 2017 dev patel and andrew garfield as boyfriends in a movie rt if u agree pic.twitter.com/vqCHwH0w9m 
Someone even pointed out that Garfield and Patel‚Äôs bromance could‚Äôve started weeks ago, when the two participated at a Hollywood Reporter roundtable. dev patel tem crush no andrew garfield https://t.co/TT9ijCqzmD ‚Äî helo (@gothroness) February 27, 2017 We really shouldn‚Äôt be all that surprised! Before the Academy Awards on Sunday, Garfield joked to ET that his target for an Oscars kiss is ‚Äúwhoever‚Äôs looking the most handsome.‚Äù ‚ÄúIf Ryan‚Äôs here, he‚Äôll have to work hard. Once is kind of like [enough], twice -- I don‚Äôt know,‚Äù he said, adorably turning into a schoolboy and shyly slicking back his hair behind his ear. Sorry, Ryan. You snooze, you lose! For more on Garfield‚Äôs ET Oscar interview, watch the video below.
